overview: Angela McDowell brings with her almost two decades of IT staffing, business development and technology experience. Ms. McDowell’s career includes as CEO and Chairman of several private companies. Angela is known throughout the field and industry for her vision and passion for Technology and IT Staffing. Angela has been in essence the “heart and soul” of the company, committed to encouraging and motivating each and every one of our candidates to reach new heights and goals that they never believed possible.
